capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing educator and an incredible witch in her own right. I've always admired her dedication to the students at Hogwarts, especially those who are often overlooked or underestimated. Her affiliation with the school is truly admirable, and I think she plays a vital role in shaping the next generation of witches and wizards.
